arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest interested in Roma’s Evan Ndicka
arts.sum: Premier League side Nottingham Forest have registered an interest in Roma defender Evan Ndicka, who is currently in his second Serie A season. According to a report by La Gazzetta…

arts.ttl: Preview: Ivory Coast vs. Gambia - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Monday's World Cup Qualifying - Africa clash between Ivory Coast and Gambia, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
